item.title: Rock crabs hitting 48s?------how do i lower
item.dc:creator: @maksimka maksimka
item.description:
@maksimka wrote:

i looked this is all it said

}
if(npcs[i].Respawns) {
int old1 = npcs[i].npcType;
if (old1 == 1267 ||old1 == 1265) {
old1 += 1;
}
int old2 = npcs[i].makeX;
int old3 = npcs[i].makeY;
int old4 = npcs[i].heightLevel;
int old5 = npcs[i].moverangeX1;
int old6 = npcs[i].moverangeY1;
int old7 = npcs[i].moverangeX2;
int old8 = npcs[i].moverangeY2;
int old9 = npcs[i].walkingType;
int old10 = npcs[i].MaxHP;
npcs[i] = null;
newNPC(old1, old2, old3, old4, old5, old6, old7, old8, old9, old10, true);
}
}
}
}
}

item.title: Rock crabs hitting 48s?------how do i lower
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

npchandler is a cfg file… and lowering the npc’s health has nothing to do with it…

inside npchandler.cfg search for the rock crabs id, lower it there…

item.title: Rock crabs hitting 48s?------how do i lower
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

go into npchandler, search for the rock crabs id (not sure what it is) then find where is says hitdiff = 5 + misc.Random(35) or whatever,(numbers will be different) and change to whatever number you want…

first number is lowest hit, next number is added to lowest hit to make its max…
